Header: SLMA Officer Cadets Familiarize with SFHQ-West Roles
Content: A group of 38 Officer Cadets under training at Diyatalawa Sri Lanka Military Academy (SLMA) as part of their familiarization module arrived at the Security Force Headquarters – West (SFHQ-West) on Sunday (9). Major A. E. O Gamage, General Staff Officer II (Training) at SFHQ-West on the instructions of Major General Mahinda Mudalige, Commander, Security Forces - West presented the role and tasks of the SFHQ-West along with a brief history of it. At the end of the lecture, those visiting Cadet Officers awarded a memento to the lecturer. Brigadier D.M.U.G Bandara, senior Officers, and Staff Officers of the SFHQ – West participated in the event.
